attributes.action: Make sign language and first aid mandatory in schools
attributes.additional_details:
So many more children are now not only deaf, but a lot are also non verbal due to other needs, this will help all children, verbal/non verbal,  deaf, not deaf be able to communicate 
First aid should also be compulsory too, why not teach all children how to save lives?
attributes.background: Get sign language and first aid taught compulsory in schools

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for the same actions:

'Add sign language on to the national schools curriculum': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599565

'Add sign language and lip reading to the national curriculum': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603209

'Add First Aid education to the national curriculum for Year 5 to Year 11': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598428

Please note that, if you choose to start another petition in the future, you would have to submit your full name as we can't accept petitions started using only a first name.
